reviews.text: I recently had the pleasure of celebrating Mothers Day @ Creole 2 Geaux with my parents. And I must say it was an experience that surpassed all my...

Went to East Market, first and foremost this area is being "revitalized." (gentrified) 
The line for Creole 2 Geaux was a few people deep, only two people...
Best creole food in Columbus. Ate there tonight.  The bourbon chicken with spicy rice was divine!!  So good that I will be back in a weekly basis.
